author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: President Higgins message to be broadcast on local radio stations
description: Cabinet assessing ‘stay at home’ measures as 50,000 deaths expected worldwide
content:
The Cabinet committee on Covid-19 will meet on Thursday almost a week after new restrictions on movement were announced last Friday.
The group, chaired by Taoiseach Leo Varadkar, is assessing the impact of the measures announced by him in a television addres… [+3665 chars]
